website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and secure, these cuff-style weights are good for average body size.
pros: Designed for individuals from 5' to 5'11" tall and under 300 pounds
cons: May run a little small for some

customer_reviews.title: Good product - know each weight is 2.5lbs
customer_reviews.text: I like them. I like how comfortable they are. You cannot adjust the weight AND each weight is 2.5lbs - totalling 5lbs. When I bought them, I thought each one was going to be 5lbs, but that was my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting bored and it's time to mix it up
customer_reviews.text: I've always been into working out, for many years. I turned 40 last year and while my body is still responding well to fitness, my mind is not. I'm getting bored and it's time to mix it up. I saw a Tracy Anderson video on YouTube and she suggested the weights. I did it without the weights, ordered them and tried the video again with the weights. Boom my booty was so sore in a great way! Sometimes I lay in front of the TV and do leg lifts. I've also put them around my wrists and done some arm circles. Nice light weight, perfect for low impact training. I love using these when I do a barre video too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: 5 lbs total, not each.
customer_reviews.text: I feel a bit mislead because these weights are 5lbs together... I intended to purchase ankle weights that are 5lbs each. I still like the comfort of them, they stay on well, and I will get a lot of use from them. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: wheelermail

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I thought they would be a little tight around my ankles (I'm male and larger than I should be) but they fit perfectly. These are great for adding resistance to every day activities.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ayers

customer_reviews.title: This was OK but not great, they should have a longer flap

customer_reviews.title: Fine

If you are using these for any kind of high intensity training be prepared to be annoyed. I use them on a rebounder for LEKfit and the sound of the sand moving is enough to drive me crazy. I am 5'5", ~130lbs, and even with the weights as tight as they can go they are still loose on me. The weight is as advertised. For the price they are fine for now but I will definitely be upgrading to a better pair soon.

customer_reviews.title: Made for Large Ankles

I even tried to place the weights higher on my leg, but they just fall down during exercise. I am really bummed. I thought these would be perfect for me, but that is not the case 😣

So I will keep these for my wrists and have ordered a different set from a different company for my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: It's good to be the king!

customer_reviews.title: Not very reliable
customer_reviews.text: After searching for ankle weights that have a simple Velcro attachment and not a strap to put through a link, I purchased 4 of these thinking the weights would hold up. First, they are not meant for small ankles. Second, the Velcro is already wearing thin. I use two weights per ankle because one ankle weight does not seem to do the job. For someone, who is just beginning to workout these are ideal. Long time weight users, I would probably invest in a different type of weight. Thank you for reading this review and wish you the best of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not So Adjustable

At first I thought they just picked up dirt but then after washing them in Coldwater I realized dirt was leeching out . After they were dried out they became brittle and unusable I don’t know what they’re made of but it’s not a material that you can use buyer beware . Hi

These ankle weights were the perfect solution. Easy & quick on and off. Very comfortable also.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to secure ankle weights

I’m pleased to report that the integrated strap is long enough to wrap around my fairly thick ankles, leaving perhaps three inches to secure the closure. The weights are very easy to wrap around my ankles and secure. I use them on my stationary bicycle and they don’t move around, which is good. So far, I really like these. Jerry

There is not enough velcro or whatever to enable adequate sticking ability for smaller legs, and it does not grip your leg very well. I would suggest increasing the space allowed to apply the velcro, instead of one small strip, and allowing tighter fastening to the leg. What a waste!
